name: Warlock Of The Genie Lord
description: A medium humanoid with a commanding presence, skilled in elemental manipulation and spellcasting, wearing studded leather armor.
memorable: Possesses resistance to multiple damage types and can enhance its attacks with elemental damage.
goals: Utilize elemental forces in combat and protect itself with versatile spellcasting.
relations: May serve or be associated with Genie Lords, other elementals, or spellcasters.
environment: Often found in locations tied to elemental energies or near Genies.
strengths: Resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage. Capable of delivering high burst damage through Elemental Burst ability.
weaknesses: Average physical combat effectiveness due to moderate Strength.
attacks: Utilizes Dagger for piercing damage combined with elemental effects, and Elemental Burst for significant area damage with versatility.
most_powerful_ability: Elemental Weapons ability allows an additional 3d6 damage of elemental type, increasing overall damage output.
skills: Possesses an average Perception skill, making it aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can levitate and breathe underwater as part of its spell repertoire.
Gains advantage on next Elemental Burst attack after taking elemental damage.
Can summon minor elementals once per day, enhancing battlefield control.
Has access to spells that provide mobility and protection like Fly and Fire Shield.
Can create barriers with Wall of Stone to control combat terrain.
spellcasting: Utilizes Charisma for spellcasting, has a spell save DC of 15, and multiple spells for varied effects.
test_queries: elemental spellcaster with high damage output
warlock capable of flying and breathing underwater
creature resistant to multiple damage types
medium humanoid with versatile elemental attacks
